title: 66. Living the farmhouse lifestyle in town
description:
You don't have to live in the middle of nowhere, have a cow, goats and a barn to live a country lifestyle. To me, the "farmhouse lifestyle" is defined by making things from scratch, embracing handmade and all things simple living. You can do that no matter where you live! In this episode I am sharing 11 ways you can live the lifestyle in town. 

My first favorite bread recipe can be found here- https://www.paulasbread.com/recipes.html#paulasbread

How to grow your own cut flowers- https://www.farmhouseonboone.com/tips-for-growing-a-cut-flower-garden-and-how-to-make-simple-arrangements

How to make your own beeswax candles- https://www.farmhouseonboone.com/how-to-make-beeswax-candles

Make your own body butter- https://www.farmhouseonboone.com/diy-natural-whipped-body-butter

Apron tutorials from the blog can be found here:

Reversible apron- https://www.farmhouseonboone.com/how-to-make-a-reversible-apron

Cross back pinafore apron- https://www.farmhouseonboone.com/diy-linen-pinafore-apron-for-women-free-pattern

Half apron- https://www.farmhouseonboone.com/how-to-make-an-apron-from-ikea-tea-towels

Buy my book- https://www.farmhouseonboone.com/book

Grab my 'Natural Body Ebook' here- https://www.farmhouseonboone.com/natural-body-ebook

Get the Simple Farmhouse Life Berkey bundles here- https://www.berkeyfilters.com/collections/simple-farmhouse-life

Get my free 10 day course on how to start a blog HERE.

Follow along with Farmhouse on Boone:

Thanks again for listening and I'll see you in the next episode of the Simple Farmhouse Life podcast!
dc:creator: Lisa Bass
